title: Searching For You - Novel Updates
tags: Short Story   Transported to Another World
author: Hino Kiiro   日野きいろ
description: While looking up at the sky on a night when the snow fell, I got lost in another world. It was similar to the world I’d lived in up until now, but a somewhat different closed-off world. The person who found me took care of me as if I were a precious treasure.>
